action.data: IF @SeenDate IS NULL Update TBL_EmailInBox SET SeenDate=getdate() , ReadUnread=1 Where EmailInID=@EmailInID

action.confirmation: _controller=ApprovalRemarks _title=Enter Remarks (Optional) - Click on OK Button to Continue. _width=500
action.data:
UPDATE [dbo].[TBL_Document_Approvals_Detail] SET [ApprovalStatus] = 1, CurrentApp= 0, Updated_DateTime=getdate(), Comments=IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine1,'') + IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine2,'') + IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine3,'') WHERE DocumentID=@DocumentID and UserID=@BusinessRules_UserId
UPDATE [dbo].[TBL_EmailInBox] SET [ReadUnread]=1,[ActionTakenYN] = 1, SeenDate=getdate() WHERE EmailInID=@EmailInID

UPDATE [dbo].[TBL_Document_Approvals_Detail] SET [ApprovalStatus] = 2, Updated_DateTime = GETDATE(), RejectedYN=1, Comments = IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine1, '')+IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine2, '')+IsNull(@Parameters_RemarksLine3, '') WHERE DocumentID = @DocumentID AND UserID = @BusinessRules_UserId UPDATE [dbo].[TBL_EmailInBox] SET [ReadUnread] = 1, [ActionTakenYN] = 2, SeenDate = GETDATE() WHERE EmailInID = @EmailInID

EXEC dbo.APPROVAL_DOCUMENT_FWD @DocumentID,@BusinessRules_UserId, @Parameters_FwdTo, @Parameters_FwdRemarks UPDATE [dbo].[TBL_EmailInBox] SET [ReadUnread]=1,[ActionTakenYN] = 1, SeenDate=getdate() WHERE EmailInID=@EmailInID
